mapper.select: SELECT c.id , c.value, c.label, c.type, c.description, c.sort, c.remarks, c.del_flag, d.id AS "department.dId", d.name AS "department.name", d.office_id AS "department.office.id", o.name AS "department.office.name" FROM sys_dict c LEFT JOIN train_department_position p ON c.value = p.position_key JOIN train_department d ON p.department_id = d.id JOIN sys_office o ON d.office_id = o.id WHERE c.value = #{value} AND c.type = #{type} AND d.id = #{department.dId}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM train_department_position WHERE department_id = #{department.dId} AND position_key = #{value}
mapper.select: SELECT p.position_key FROM train_department_position p LEFT JOIN train_department d ON p.department_id = d.id JOIN sys_user u ON d.office_id = u.company_id WHERE u.id = #{userId} AND d.del_flag = 0
